How anyone can take this guy seriously is incredible to me. We are truly reaching new lows.

Before and after satellite imagery of the Fort Tiuna Military Base in Caracas, Venezuela. 
Significant damage can be seen to at least two facilities, where fires are actively burning.

Apparently this channel was the 139th most popular news and media channel on Telegram in 2025, with nearly 90 million views.
We went from around 4,000 subscribers to over 32,000 in that time period. Truly incredible, I can't thank you all enough.
HIMARS to Shebekino and then further to Belgorod City
S-300 launches from the southeastern outskirts of Belgorod City
S-300 launches from the southeastern outskirts of Belgorod City
The rocket(s) were likely intercepted. A drone attack continues on Belgorod.
Repeated MLRS launches to Shebekino and Belgorod.
Repeated MLRS launches to Shebekino and Belgorod.
These don't seem to be targeting Belgorod City, but rather Shebekino or areas to the north.
High threat of Kh-59/69 cruise missile launches from Su-34s in Kursk Oblast.
High threat of Kh-59/69 cruise missile launches from Su-34s in Kursk Oblast.
Correction: The threat is due to a Su-57 flying south along the border between Oryol and Lipetsk Oblasts, in the direction of its launch lines in eastern Kursk Oblast.
Correction: The threat is due to a Su-57 flying south along the border between Oryol and Lipetsk Oblasts, in the direction of its launch lines in eastern Kursk Oblast.
A Su-34 is also flying in the area of the Kursk-Belgorod border.
The Su-57 has entered eastern Kursk Oblast, approaching its launch lines.

It seems that the Su-57 was mixed up with the Su-34 (which is from Akhtubinsk Airbase, Astrakhan Oblast), and that it's the only one airborne. 
Approximate path shown on the map.
Unidentified missile in southern Sumy Oblast

The Su-34 flew away from the launch lines and is now circling east of Kursk City. 
Presumably it carried out a launch maneuver over eastern Kursk Oblast.
The missile (presumably Kh-69) is flying on a southwestern course past Trostyanets, Sumy Oblast, to Zinkiv, Poltava Oblast.
The missile (presumably Kh-69) is flying on a southwestern course past Trostyanets, Sumy Oblast, to Zinkiv, Poltava Oblast.
Changed course to Hadyach, Poltava Oblast at an altitude of ~600 metres
Flying past the southern outskirts of Hadyach in the direction of Zavodske, Poltava Oblast.

Course remains largely unchanged, around 60 km from Pyryatyn, Poltava Oblast.
It is repeatedly disappearing from radars.
Course remains largely unchanged, around 60 km from Pyryatyn, Poltava Oblast.  It is repeatedly disappearing from radars.
It was shot down by Ukrainian air defence over northern Poltava Oblast.

Pro-Iran Hackers Breached Phone Of Former Israeli Interior Minister (Photos)
The pro-Iran Handala hacking group announced on January 3 that it had hacked the phone of former Israeli interior and justice minister Ayelet Shaked.
‚ÄúFor years, Shaked stood on podiums, preaching security, authority, and the fight against her enemies. But now, her messages, documents, and confidential information about Hamas, Iran, and behind-the-scenes decisions are in our hands,‚Äù Handala claimed on X. ‚ÄúStay tuned; parts of what we have uncovered will soon be released, so everyone will know.‚Äù
The hacking group shared some 60 photos and videos it said were stolen from the phone of the former right-wing minister.
Many of the materials shared by the group were personal, but some were related to the work of Shake, including several photos showing Shaked signing Justice Ministry documents and meeting with former prime minister Naftali Bennett in a government office.
Read more 
HERE

Military Situation In Northern Palestine On January 3, 2026 (Map Update)

Russian Army Is About To Overrun Ukrainian Defenses Between Slovyansk And Kostiantynivka (Videos)
On January 3, Russian military operations to the east of the city of Kostiantynivka in Donetsk began to gain momentum with the capture of a settlement.
Bondarnoye, located 28 kilometers away from Kostiantynivka, was captured by the Yug [South] Group of Forces, according to the Russian Ministry of Defense. The capture of the settlement enhanced fire control over the E40 highway, located to the west, which leads north to the city of Slovyansk.
The Yug Group of Forces also made gains to the west of the E40 in recent days, mainly in and around Markove.
Read more 
HERE

Trump Shares Details On Capture Of Maduro, Says U.S. Will Run Venezuela Indefinitely
President Donald Trump said on January 3 that the United States is ‚Äúgoing to run‚Äù Venezuela indefinitely after capturing the country‚Äôs president, Nicol√°s Maduro, in an early morning operation.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to run the country until such time as we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition,‚Äù Trump told reporters during a press conference.
‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want to be involved with having someone else get in, and we have the same situation that we had for the last long period of years. So we are going to run the country,‚Äù he added.
Trump stressed that the U.S. should take charge of Venezuela to ensure that the eventual next leader has the ‚Äúgood of the Venezuelan people" in mind. Nevertheless, he offered no timeline for how long such a transition of power was expected to take.
Praising the early morning operation in the Venezuelan capital, Caracas, Trump said that no American service members were killed.

Slovyansk Front: Russian Army Takes On Ukrainian Defenses South Of Key City
In the Kupyansk sector, the situation is gradually stabilizing, though there is still heavy fighting in the city center. Russian units have repelled a series of attacks and consolidated their positions in the Moskovka residential development, thwarting the Ukrainian command's plans to use it as a bridgehead.
In the Slovyansk sector on the eastern flank, Russian units advanced west of Siversk and drove Ukrainian units from the heights north of Reznykivka. They are currently engaged in fierce fighting for Zakotne and Ilychivka. 
Meanwhile, Kyiv and Washington have finished coordinating a joint military document that defines long-term support parameters.
Read more 
HERE
